description:
Al Jarde had been obsessed with revenge, but in the end he protects Minami with his life. Alma returns to normal, but Soma refuses to give up on his revenge or his EX-ARM. Beta takes over the multibots and stands in the Squad`s way, plunging them into despair. But that`s when Ogre is finally deployed in battle.
Akira swears anew to fight to protect the people he cares about, using the strength that they have given him.
Source: crunchyroll
